transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan ji. Haan ji Narendra ji very good evening kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya batao.
Executive: Sir main actually seedhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se senior manager abhi aapse us time aapne call kiya tha us time bhi meri baat hui thi aapse aapko yaad hoga dopahar mein jab aapne call kiya tha. To maine us cheez se related aage discussion kar liya hai sir. Theek hai. Already humne is cheez se related concern open kar diya hai ki aapka ye ye issue hai. Right. But jo bhi jinhone bhi pehle aapko ye cheez bola tha pehle hum unse coordinate kar rahe hain ki ha unhone kis bihaf pe aapko ye cheez bola tha dene ke liye. Theek hai ki ha aapko aapko ye bata rahe the na kya name bata rahe the aap?
Customer: Ankit Jain.
Executive: Ankit Jain karke hai na. To wohi hamara already ha ji already hamara discussion chal raha hai matlab un logon ne already hamare paas concern open kiya hai sir aapke paas woh assign karne ke liye. To thoda time lagega isme already discussion chal raha hai. Dono cheeze maine kar di hai sir ki ya to aapka account manager woh assign honge ya to aapko refund chahiye.
Customer: Haan bas do hi cheez hai ya to account manager Ankit Jain chahiye otherwise mera close kar do mera amount refund kar do.
Executive: Ji ji maine ye dono cheeze aage forward kar di hai sir aur already discussion chal raha hai aapke case pe. To aapko tension lene ki zarurat nahi hai jo bhi solution hoga aapko mil jayega. Plus abhi aapne customer mera clear karo na ji mere banda aaya hai mere product update kare main usko bulaun kaise bulaun abhi maine Ankit ji ko phone kiya bola aapka account manager to ho hi nahi.
Executive: Sir actually abhi na kya hai ki itni jaldi cheeze nahi ho paati hain. Hume bhi discussion karna padta hai kyunki hamare yahan par bhi process hai sir aap samajh sakte ho. Theek hai to hume bhi sir already maine bataya na is cheez se related already concern humne hamare paas aaya hua hai aapke ye jo aap bata rahe ho na apna issue ye already mere manager ke upar jo mere manager hain unke paas already aapka ye issue aaya hua hai. Woh already ispe working hai will try hum aapka ye kara de sir ek do din mein wohi hai ki thoda closing ka time hai.
Customer: Mere ek din do din nahi mere to ek tarikh do tarikh ko kara dena lekin agar ek do tarikh tak nahi hue to mere ko paisa dalo.
Executive: Sir. Sir ek minute aap mujhe dijiyega. Main ye bol rahi thi aapko ki already maine ye cheez forward kar diya hai aage theek hai jaise hi kuch solution aata hai main aapko bata dungi main bas aapko yahi bol sakti hu sir kyunki ye na actually mere hand mein nahi hai ki main account manager aapka change kar du maine main aage concern open kar diya woh maine kar diya. Woh aap keh rahe ho closing chal rahi hai aage closing koi baat nahi ek tarikh tak koi baat nahi do tarikh ko agar mera nahi hota hai to mujhe mera paisa dal do. Clear baat hai mujhe nahi chahiye IndiaMART ka plan.
Executive: Sir theek hai main samajh gayi aapki baat ko. Maine aapke ko bhi phone karke keh diya dobara mere office mein mat aana plan lene maine abhi aage jo mere ko plan diya na unko bhi maine mana karke keh diya mere office mein pair rakhne ki zarurat nahi hai agar agar ye nahi aata hai Ankit Jain to.
Customer: Haan theek hai nahi chahiye mere ko IndiaMART se koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Maine bhi actually already kar diya hai sir theek hai ab jaise hi mujhe woh log batate hain ki kya karna hai to chahe kisi se bhi baat kara do mere ko mere ko usse koi dikkat nahi hai agar nahi hua to mujhe mera paisa chahiye do tarikh ko. Seedhi si baat hai aap closing kar rahe ho closing kar lo koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Sir baat closing ki nahi hai baat wohi hai process follow karne ki.
Customer: Baat process aapki kuch bhi ho main kya keh raha hu madam aapki process kuch bhi ho last process ho agar Ankit Jain nahi aata hai mera account manager to band kar do IndiaMART ko mere ko koi matlab nahi hai mera paisa chahiye. Main woh cheeze samajh gayi hu maine dono cheez aage bol diya main wohi cheez to aapko bata rahi hu sir aapke senior manager ko bhi bol raha hu main wohi aapko bata rahi hu ki already maine dono line forward kar di hai sir ki ya to aapko Ankit Jain chahiye ya to aapko refund chahiye maine dono cheeze aapko bata di hai. Theek hai seedhe shabdon mein aap wohi cheez dal do ya to Ankit Jain chahiye client ko ya phir paisa chahiye.
Executive: Bata diya hai sir aapne mujhe bola ki main aapka ye cheez forward karu aage maine already forward kar diya hai sir. Theek hai ab jaise hi koi solution aayega aapko already us cheez se related call aa jayega uska koi issue nahi hai. Baaki aapne ye jo customer care pe call kiya tha to ye aapka ek concern ek tarah se open ho gaya tha. To abhi to main ye concern aapka close kar du na sir. Aapne mujhe bataya maine woh cheez aage forward kar di hai.
Customer: Jab tak woh nahi rahe jab tak aapka khula hi rehna do mere ko to mera paisa chahiye nahi Ankit Jain chahiye chahe aap band karo chahe chalu rakho mujhe koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: To abhi ye concern aapka close nahi karna hai aap ye keh rahe ho. Haan kuch concern close nahi karna hai mere ko to ya to Ankit Jain chahiye ya mera paisa dal ke free karo. Baat khatam. Do hi kaam hai.
Executive: But sir koshish to maine but sir woh cheez to maine already aage forward kar di hai. Aap apne senior se baat karo maine koi mere ko close wlose nahi chahiye mere ko ya to mera band karo nahi mere ko paisa chahiye. Theek hai theek hai okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Ankit Jain as account manager.

- Otherwise, wants a refund.

- Wants product update done by account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive assured issue is being worked on.

- Executive has forwarded request for account manager/refund.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call with a solution.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account manager, closing, process
